definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:TempBan</field><value name="VAL"><block type="get_command_parameter_number"><field name="param">seconds</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="get_command_parameter_entity"><field name="param">player</field></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="6"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ban </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="entity_name"><value name="entity"><block type="get_command_parameter_entity"><field name="param">player</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> You have been banned for </field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:TempBan</field><value name="entity"><block type="get_command_parameter_entity"><field name="param">player</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> seconds.
